summary:
• I have been in the IT industry since 1998. I started as a programmer, transitioned into Quality management and later Project management. 

• With a technical background and complemented by certification in Project Management (certified in Scrum, Prince 2® Practitioner), I present myself as a Senior Project Manager / Program Manager. 

• Started working as freelance Project Manager/Program manager as of 2019

• I have a proven track record in executing complex IT Programs/Projects on time; internationally, with solid customer facing and consulting experience.

• As an International Project Manager I have a successful track record in management of team on-site, offshore & composite model. I have good experience of working in multicultural environments


• ICT Project Management

• ICT Program Management

• Product customisation and Implementation 

• Stakeholder Management at C-level

• Digital Transformation

• Global markets

• Predictive Analysis

• Machine Learning

• Big Data

• Offshore / Near shore teams

• Consultancy

• Backbase

• Agile / Scrum

• Medical Device Regulations (MDR)

• Microsoft Dynamics NAV

• ERP Implementation & Data Migrations

• Retail

• CRM

• E-Commerce

projects.title: Care4Today
projects.description: For Philips and JnJ, I am the Sr. Project manager responsible for JnJ’s Digital innovation program, pioneered by Care4Today (C4T) application for hospital systems using Philips’ HSDP cloud service. This digital program is to support Health Care Professionals (HCP) and Patients of hips, knees and bariatrics for their entire surgical journey.

projects.title: GSK: Digital transformation pain relief products
projects.description: For GSK, I was the project manager for driving the newly acquired Medical device thru redesigning, redevelopment, acceptance, formative & summative testing, clinical trials phases; moreover, coordinate with regulatory stakeholders to arrange documents according to 62304 standards and prepare a file for submission to notified body for CE mark.

projects.title: Mobile Banking for Siam Commercial Bank (SCB) Thailand
projects.description: For Siam Commercial Bank (SCB) in Thailand, I Sr. Project manager who was responsible on behalf of Backbase to develop, delivery and integrate mission critical feature(s) for their existing mobile banking app.  Time to market was the key to this project as SCB wanted to release the feature before their competitors and thereby maintain their number one position.

profile_positions.description:
Providing overall management for the delivery of Supply Chain, Finance and Sustainability related projects. The position works closely with business and technical leadership, serving as a facilitator and leader accountable for the successful delivery of projects, within the expected quality, budget, timeline, and scope.

• Partner with the IT PMO team to scope, plan and deliver at scale Supply Chain, Finance and Sustainability implementations for the company.
• Actively participate in project scoping and planning activities and ensure alignment between all parties
• Liaises with other IT and business functions, such as IT Product teams and leadership to ensure quality and timely delivery of IT projects
• Responsible for the management of external vendors in terms of SOW and engagement requirements, ensuring all vendor management quality expectations are met or exceeded.

#Sustainability
#SupplyChain
#Finance
#ERPImplementations
#Programmanagement
#Projectmanagement
profile_positions.title: Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
1. Managing transformation program to merge ERP systems and other IT systems and rollout SAP S4 / Hana in all the GrandVision OpCo countries in EMEA. Program spans across 8 countries and rollout of 1500+ stores. 

2. Managing program for transition of stand-alone banner into global solution stack and manage OpCo integration. GrandVision Solaris brand needs to be transitioned into the global Essilor Luxottica stack of solutions.

3. Creating a template implementation strategy and way of working that can be implemented across multiple OpCo countries. Ideate multiple ways to decrease project duration of ERP rollout to save costs and achieve quicker time to market.

#MicrosoftDynamicsNAV

profile_positions.title: Program Manager (Contract)

profile_positions.description:
1.	Initiating the transition from a product focus to a project focus by setting up a program framework to upgrade 9 IKEA Franchisees retailers to the latest NAV platform through the development of 9 different code streams, 83 migrations and the implementation of new architecture across 25 countries, in support of the business strategy and objectives. 

2.	Strategically leading and delivering complex software development programs and projects through the application of Agile and waterfall frameworks depending on the project needs.

          a.	Delivering software solutions within NAV for Inter Ikea Systems B.V to support their business processes. 
          b.	Delivering software solutions within NAV for the IKEA Franchise Retailers to support their business and operational processes.

3.	Facilitating people change management, integrating and merging various software development teams to better align with the business vision and business growth.

4.	Supporting the business through the strategic changes by continuously reviewing, assessing and improving the ways of working to align closer with the scrum framework and to better meet the customers needs. 

#Microsoft Dynamics NAV
#Retail
#ERP Implementations
#CRM
#E-Commerce
#Data Migration
#Change Management
